CAIRO , May 19 ( Xinhua ) -- Gunmen shot dead two Egyptian policemen on Monday in Minya province , 220 km south of the capital Cairo , as they were heading home , the interior ministry said in a statement .
The militants intercepted and opened fire randomly at the policemen who were on a motorbike , the statement added .

Since the ouster of Islamist President Mohamed Morsi by the army last July , a wave of militant attacks and explosions targeting security personnel and their premises have risen mainly in the restive Sinai Peninsula .
But recently , the attacks have crept into the capital and Delta cities .
A recent government report said the death toll from such attacks reached nearly 500 .
